title: Labeladono
author: Labeladono
content: Being a new member of the bitcointalk forum and someone who is eager to learn more about the community is a pleasure.I'm hoping to meet people here who are well-versed in this forum and who can instruct, correct, and help me understand its fundamentals. I was instructed to visit my local board and speak with individuals of my nationality so they could teach me.I'm really happy to be here, and I'm willing to pick up new skills and accept criticism. Being a new member of the bitcointalk forum and someone who is eager to learn more about the community is a pleasure.I hope to and seek to

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: I they happy say I got engage in these local because I be newbie I hope I go get legendary member wey go help me in the bitcointalk to know more about bitcoin

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Labeladono on December 29, 2022, 06:22:10 AMBeing a new member of the bitcointalk forum and someone who is eager to learn more about the community is a pleasure.I'm hoping to meet people here who are well-versed in this forum and who can instruct, correct, and help me understand its fundamentals. I was instructed to visit my local board and speak with individuals of my nationality so they could teach me.I'm really happy to be here, and I'm willing to pick up new skills and accept criticism. Being a new member of the bitcointalk forum and someone who is eager to learn more about the community is a pleasure.I hope to and seek toCriticism will definitely come but when it does, please never get mad or feel discouraged because no one owns here and here belongs to everyone.Congratulations for finding your local board and one thing I will always advice you is never to plagiarize as this is one unacceptable offence that isn't tolerated in the community and leads to possible account barn.Always try as much as possible to reference what ever work not originally written by you.Always ask questions and not be too conscious of what people might think or say.Always check on the beginners and help board and threads as you could get all the possible solutions to any challenges you might encounter as a newbie.Welcome and always remember that learning never ends as we're all here to unlearn, learn and relearn.
